reviewText: We had rented thus DVD from Netflix and enjoyed it so much we wanted a copy for our DVD library.  Great stories and music.  I am sure anyone would enjoy this.

I and my wife have watched this wonderful dvd many times and even with others as well. It is very inspiring and well done on every level. I highly recommend it for inspiration and even for ministering to others who are either Christians, nonchristians, or merely nominal christians. Anyone would benefit by watching this video and the stories and the singing of five of the greatest hymns ever written.
I watched the movie and loved it I'm just wondering if you have a soundtrack for the movie.? Please let me know I would love babe one. Thanks.
I love it so much that I ordered a second one for my church library. The stories are moving and I will recommend to everyone. Love the service of the seller.
Excellent job of telling the stories behind the hymns.

Beautiful beyond words, the video editing, suberb, the discussions inspiring, the singers wonderful.  The way the 6 hymns came into this physical world reaches into the beyond.  Extremely well done on all levels.
I love learning the story behind the writing of old hymns. This video is well worth the watching, as it inspires, uplifts, and sheds light on the lives of others.
It gives you a deeper appreciation to know the history of the origin, inspirations and thoughts of the song writer.  If you like to know these things, you will love this review of the songs.
